title: What two swords were made from Ned Stark's sword? - Quora
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire (book series)

response.answer_text: Originally, Tywin made two swords from Ice, one for Jaime and one for Joffrey. Widow’s Wail was given to the horrific King, and when he died, Jaime took it. As for the other one, Oathkeeper, Jaime gave it to Brienne when she started her quest for Arya and Sansa, because of the oath Brienne had made to Catelyn.
